description: Developing KOS, a SaaS for aesthetic medical clinics. KOS merges booking, procedure management, payment, and data analysis into one product. I refine its design, development, and operations with relentless thought.

Developed mobile apps and web services for “Science of Love” and “BLIMP.” I contributed to their pivot from content to e-commerce, creating engaging products. I led the e-commerce pivot through rapid prototyping and feedback, driving changes in the business model.
